name: BulkUpdateOrganizationUnitSettings
description:
Updates some of the non-unique the OrganizationUnit's settings. This service can be used to only update a subset of the settings of the OrganizationUnit by providing only the fields you want to update.
If a field is not part of the request message (or has value `undefined`) then the setting is not updated. If the field is present but has a value of `null` then it's assumed you want to unset the setting.

The targeted OrganizationUnits can be identified by providing `OrganizationUnitIDs` or an `OrganizationUnitSetID`.

All OrganizationUnits will be updated, if one of them fails, no changes will be persisted.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `OrganizationUnitSettings:Edit`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AssortmentID": 123,
  "AttachedToUserID": 123,
  "CashHandlerID": 123,
  "CostPriceCalculationMethod": 3,
  "CountryID": "st",
  "CountrySubdivisionID": "string",
  "EnableEndlessSupplierStock": true,
  "LanguageID": "string",
  "OrganizationUnitIDs": [
    123
  ],
  "OrganizationUnitSetID": 123,
  "RegisterCashLimit": 123.456,
  "ReturnOrganizationUnitID": 123,
  "RoleSetID": 123,
  "SafeCashLimit": 123.456,
  "Subnet": "string",
  "TimeZone": "string",
  "Type": 4096,
  "UseForAccounting": true,
  "VisibilityGroupID": 123
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/BulkUpdateOrganizationUnitSettings

B.name: AssortmentID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Assortment`

B.name: AttachedToUserID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `User`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: CashHandlerID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `CashHandler`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: CostPriceCalculationMethod
B.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Manual
* `1` - WeightedAverageCost
* `2` - LastIn
* `3` - Fifo

B.name: CountryID
B.description:
This string must be between 2 (incl) and 2 (incl) characters long.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: CountrySubdivisionID
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: LanguageID
B.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: OrganizationUnitIDs
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

B.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

B.name: RegisterCashLimit
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ReturnOrganizationUnitID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: RoleSetID
B.description: This is the ID of a `RoleSet`

B.name: SafeCashLimit
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Subnet
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: TimeZone
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Type
B.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Shop
* `2` - WebShop
* `4` - Container
* `8` - Pickup
* `16` - Warehouse
* `36` - Country
* `64` - Franchise
* `128` - EVA
* `256` - TestOrganizationUnit
* `512` - DisableLogin
* `1024` - Supplier
* `1024` - ExternalSupplier
* `3072` - Consignment
* `4096` - B2b
* `8196` - Region
* `16384` - ReturnsPortal
* `32768` - Restitution
* `65536` - RepairCenter
* `131072` - Mobile
* `262144` - ConcessionStore

B.name: VisibilityGroupID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `VisibilityGroup`

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

E.name: ExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

E.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
E.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

E.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
